title: Obsession: Girl Abducted
description: In this dark exploration of obsession, we glimpse what compels a man to take his fantasies to extremes. As the object of his desire is showered with both love and cruel control, she is molded into his willing sex object, or so it would seem. What develops is an intense, if conflicted, BDSM love story. Itâ€™s a dangerous journey of self-discovery on the parts of both the man obsessed and the woman he would claim for his own.
author: Claire Thompson
